attributes.action: call out the military to protect vegetables from slugs and replace Gordon with the captured slugs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Foreign slugs are eating our vegetables and this must be stopped. We can save our vegetables and use the rounded up vermin to govern the country (they will certainly do a better job). The military can be recalled from foreign shores (saving british lives) and can save the British vegetable from further slug butchery. I am sure the SAS could deal with the slugs in a few short bloody encounters. Tally Ho.

rejection.details: It is not clear what you are requesting.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
